Hi folks,

I made a good batch file for launching heritrix on Windows XP Me=
dia 
Center, AMD processor, 1 Gig of RAM, HP Paviliion, SP2 with all 
updat=
es as of 1/23/3006. Just thought I would share it back with the 
group sinc=
e this group pointed me in some really good directions on 
how to set this =
up. 

I have it running under d:\heritrix feel free to change that to suit =

your will. Plus I had to download the latest Java JRE to complete 
the pro=
cess. happy crawling

regards
Dan Morrill
